gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Celtics 119, Heat 111
gameRecap.excerpt: The Celtics defeated the Heat, 119-111.  Derrick White (9-15 FG) led the way with 28 points, six rebounds, three blocks and five 3pt. FG.  Jaylen Brown (27 points, six rebounds) and Jayson Tatum (22 points, eight rebounds, five assists) combined for 49 points in the victory. Tyler Herro tallied 28 points, six rebounds, six assists and five 3pt. FG for the Heat, while Bam Adebayo added 27 points, seven rebounds and two blocks in the losing effort.  The Celtics improve to 2-0 on the season, while the Heat fall to 1-1.
